KnowledgeArticleFeedback.name: KnowledgeArticleFeedback
KnowledgeArticleFeedback.description: Represents information about feedback from users on Knowledge articles and details about assignment of feedback to the article owner or team to take action.

AssignedToId.description: The user ID of the feedback assignee, who reviews and takes action on the feedback.

FeedbackResponseId.description: The unique ID of the feedback response associated with the feedback record.

FeedbackSource.description: The source of feedback. Possible values are: Internal Community

FeedbackSubmitterId.description: The ID of the user who submitted feedback.

IsLiked.description: The answer to the Article Liked question in the feedback form.

KnowledgeArticle.description: The ID of the article associated with the feedback response.

KnowledgeArticleUrl.description: The URL of the article version associated with the feedback response.

KnowledgeArticleVersion.description: The version of the article associated with the feedback response.

KnowledgeArticleVersionTitle.description: The title of the article version associated with the feedback response.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the feedback record was last accessed or referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the feedback record was last viewed.

LinkedArticleEntityId.description: Internal entity that links a Knowledge article version and survey invitation.

Name.description: A unique name automatically assigned to the Knowledge article feedback when it's created. You can't change the format or value of this field.

OwnerId.description: The user ID of the article feedback owner.

ReviewActionTaken.description: The review action taken to address the feedback. You can configure the possible values for this picklist field.

ReviewComment.description: The review comment provided by the feedback assignee. This is optional. The maximum length is 1,212 characters.

ReviewCompletionDate.description: The date when the review was completed.

ReviewDueDate.description: The due date for completing the feedback review.

ReviewStatus.description: The review status of the feedback. You can configure the possible values for this picklist field.
